maria_db.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT seg_id, seg_name, nudge_type, suggest_id, polling_time, exposure_name, set_slot_cnt, exposure_id, nudge_id, nudge_name, suggest_name, TYPE, Ifnull(manual_text, '') manual_text, ext_info, wait_time, slot_cnt, menu_id, icon_id, slot_idx FROM nudge_v524.nudge_setting_v WHERE Date_format(Date_add(Now(), interval + 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN start_dt AND end_dt) v WHERE NOT v.manual_text = '["hide"]'

maria_db_dev.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT seg_id, seg_name, nudge_type, suggest_id, polling_time, exposure_name, set_slot_cnt, exposure_id, nudge_id, nudge_name, suggest_name, TYPE, Ifnull(manual_text, '') manual_text, ext_info, wait_time, slot_cnt, menu_id, icon_id, slot_idx FROM nudge_v524.nudge_setting_v WHERE Date_format(Date_add(Now(), interval + 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN start_dt AND end_dt) v WHERE NOT v.manual_text = '["hide"]'
